roleset.name: doubt, disbelieve
roleset.note: DOUBT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'doubt' based on sentences in financial subcorpus; adjectival 'doubtful' based on BOLT-7. Memberof VNcls conjecture-29.5-1, judgment-33-1-1. Comparison with'believe'. (from doubt.01-v)
DOUBT-N NOTES: Frames file for 'doubt' based on sentences infinancial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison with'believe'. (from doubt.01-n predicate notes)
DOUBTFUL-J: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from doubtful.01-j)

example.name: doubt-v: sentential disbelief
example.text: Although takeover experts said they doubted Mr. Steinberg will make a bid by himself...
example.arg: Mr. Steinberg will make a bid by himself

example.name: doubt-n: Within LVC
example.text: Although the original plan only calls for the Shihkang Work Station to operate for one year , Li Chieh - ying opines , " I havemy doubts about whether we 'll actually be able to leave after ayear . "
example.arg: about whether we 'll actually be able to leave after a year

example.name: doubt-n: all args
example.text: We see her utter desperation in the plaintive tones of the song itself and in her doubt that her life can ever be healed.
example.arg: that her life can ever be healed

example.name: doubtful-j: arg0
example.text: My mom keeps putting it off , which i hope is because she plans to give me the new one for my birthday , but I 'm also doubtful because she 's so adamant about me not getting it
example.arg: because she's so adamant about me not getting

example.name: doubtful-j; empty it.
example.text: It was somewhat doubtful that the fox had borrowed the tiger 's terror .
example.arg: that the fox had borrowed the tiger's terror

roleset.name: skeptical/hard to believe
roleset.note: DUBIOUS-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Related to 'doubt'. (from dubious.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: Meanwhile , the difficulty to pass this by referendum in Taiwan is also predictable . After all , Taiwanese people are accustomed to status quo and are highly dubious about any changes .
